The Dusty Attic.script: Elara stumbled upon an old, intricately woven tapestry hidden beneath a moth-eaten blanket in her grandmother's attic. It depicted a scene of vibrant market life, but with a curious, almost invisible figure woven into the background.

The Faded Journal.script: Tucked within the tapestry's folds was a brittle journal, its pages filled with faded ink. The journal spoke of Anya, a brilliant weaver who used her art to secretly record the whispers of rebellion during a time of strict censorship.

The Unveiling.script: Elara realized the tapestry wasn't just art; it was a coded message, the "hidden figure" Anya's way of marking her defiance, a silent protest woven into the fabric of history.
